title: Interview with Professor Louise Owusu-Kwarteng
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Lousie Owusu-Kwarteng who is an associate professor of Sociology at the university of Greenwich. Louise talks about her research on ethnicity and education, the experiences of West African students, intra-racial tensions and her current research on black identity and music.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
